result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerked by AP. 
Defendant Timothy M Morgan in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Russell Edward Berg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CF153 AND 15CF185

2:45  Court relates and gives appearances.
2:47  Counsel relate.
3:06  Timothy Morgan makes statement.
3:07  Court relates.  Court and counsel relate.

15CF153
Count #1: State moves to amend to possession of amphetamine 961.41(3g)(d) an unclassified misdemeanor.  Court grants motion.  Defendant pleads guilty.  Court finds defendant guilty.

Count #1:
SW
1 year probation (report by Wednesday; 9/16/15 at 1:00 PM
Any and all evaluations, counseling, treatment and follow-up recommended by PO
AODA
Pay court costs and DNA surcharge
If revoked from probation, 2 days jail credit.
Absolute sobriety.
Maintain employment
If un or underemployed, seek work .
Must not possess or consume alcoholic beverages.  
Must not possess or consume controlled substances or drug paraphernalia.

Count #2:  State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants.
Count #3:  State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants.
Count #4:  State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants.

Count #5:  Defendant pleads guilty.  Court finds defendant guilty.
$761.50 forf.  60 days to pay
6 month DL revocation
Comply with standard alcohol or drug assessment.

15CF185
Count #1:  State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants.
Count #2:  State moves to dismiss and read in.  Court grants.

Defendant Timothy M Morgan in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS COVERS 15CF153 and 15CF185.
Reset.

Clerked by WH. 
Defendant Timothy M Morgan in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
THIS ALSO COVERS 15CF185.

ARRAIGNMENT ON 15CF153. -  Amended information has been filed.
Plea of Not Guilty

plea hearing date covers both files.  Plea hearing scheduled for September 2, 2015 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must have no contact with Kirsten M. 
05/11/2015 MODIFIED FROM MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH KIRSTEN M TO MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH KIRSTEN M, EXCEPT MAY HAVE CONTACT WITH HER BY TEXT MESSAGE FOR THE PURPOSE OF CHILD CUSTODY AND PLACEMENT ISSUES ONLY, OR AS ALLOWED BY THE FAMILY COURT ORDER. ALL OTHER CONDITIONS REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

05/29/2015 MODIFIED FROM A $200.00 CASH BOND TO A $400.00 CASH BOND.  MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH KIRSTEN M EXCEPT THEODORE M MAY BE THIRD PARTY FOR CHILD CUSTODY ISSUES.

Defendant Timothy M Morgan in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Defendant Timothy M Morgan in custody.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
15CF185 and 15CF153 called.  State requests to modify cash bond to an additional $200 for a total of $400 cash bond with added condition of absolutely no contact with Kirsten M.  Attorney Raymond relates and requests third party contact be through Defendant's father.  Court orders bond modified in 15CF185 to $400 cash with condition of no contact Kirsten M except Theodore M may be third party for child custody issues.

Clerked by AP
Defendant Timothy M Morgan in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

THIS COURT RECORD COVERS 15CF153 AND 15CF185

Reset to 7/13/15 at 2:00 PM before Judge Boyle.
Bond to continue.



15CF185 (PRELIMINARY HEARING and ARRAIGNMENT):
11:30  Court relates and gives appearances.

Notice of Completion of No Contact Class

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-537-1191.

Must have no contact with Kirsten M.

TO MUST HAVE NO CONTACT WITH KIRSTEN M., EXCEPT MAY HAVE CONTACT WITH HER BY TEXT MESSAGE FOR THE PURPOSE OF CHILD CUSTODY AND PLACEMENT ISSUES ONLY, OR AS ALLOWED BY THE FAMILY COURT ORDER. ALL OTHER CONDITIONS REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT.

Defendant Timothy M Morgan in court with attorney Ryan Joseph Raymond.  Angela Lynn Beranek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

This hearing is on motion to modify bond to change condition of "no contact with Kirsten M" to "no contact with Kirsten M, except may have contact with her by text message for the purpose of child custody and placement issues only, or as allowed by the family court order.  All other conditions of previous bond to remain in full force and effect."
Court grants motion.
